# Tetsubo of Earth (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 2]] (Earth)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** Tetsubo-like beam

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 117

A 6-foot-long tetsubo formed of earth springs forth from your hands. You wield this weapon with proficiency as if it were a greatclub. Attacks with the *tetsubo of earth* are regular melee attacks. The tetsubo deals 1d10 points of damage +1 point per two caster levels (maximum +10). The tetsubo is considered a +1 weapon for purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
